#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
long long int gcd(long long int a,long long int b)
{
	return b ? gcd(b,a%b):a;
}
int main()
{
	long long int t,x1,y1,x2,y2,g1,g2;
	cin>>t;
	
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>x1>>y1>>x2>>y2;
		x1=abs(x1);
		x2=abs(x2);
		y1=abs(y1);
		y2=abs(y2);
		g1=gcd(x1,y1);
		g2=gcd(x2,y2);
		while(g1>0&&g1<g2)
		g1=g1*2;
		if(g1==g2)
		cout<<"YES"<<endl;
		else
			cout<<"NO"<<endl;
		
	}
	
	return 0;
}
